Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Definitely \Def"i*nite*ly\, adv. In a definite manner; with precision; precisely; determinately. [1913 Webster]

definitely adv : without question and beyond doubt; "it was decidedly too expensive"; "she told him off in spades"; "by all odds they should win" [syn: {decidedly}, {unquestionably}, {emphatically}, {in spades}, {by all odds}]
